title: _context​
content: </> Context._context: boolean Indicates it is a Context

title: key​
content: </> Context.key: string The key of the Context.

title: value​
content: </> Context.value: any The default value that will be retrieved if there is no provider

title: Context​
content: </> type Context = { _context: boolean, key: string, value: any } A context Object

title: Key​
content: </> type Key = string | Context The key used to filter which context to get

title: version​
content: </> FusionContext.version: { major: number, minor: number, patch: number } The current Version of Fusion-Context

title: Context​
content: </> FusionContext.Context( key: string, defaultValue: any ) → FusionContext.Context Creates a new Context object that is used as a template for providers and default value for Consumers

title: Consume​
content: </> FusionContext.Consume(key: FusionContext.Key) → any Looks through the call stack to find a provider to get a value from.

title: Provide​
content: </> FusionContext.Provide( key: FusionContext.Key, value: any ) → void Creates a new Provider that provides the Context to all it's Consumers.
